title: What is broadband connection and how does it work? - Quora

response.answer_text: Wireline connection working with WiFi modem to conect with Smart TV,CCTV, MOBILES,PC etc.service provider after installation give you user and password for protection , Speed should be fixed in Mbps letest technology is FTTH (FIBER TO THE HOME) Minimum speed 50Mbps to 1000Mbps.speed is dependent on Feasiblity & Technology. Types of technology ADSL,DSL:-Spped-4Mbps VDSL,EOC:-16MBPS FTTH:-50,100,200,1000MBPS

Broadband connection is an always on internet connection that provides connectivity not below a specific speed (This speed is dependent on the country’s law and amendments made time to time, for eg. a few years back, in India this was 256 Kbps and now it is 512 Kbps!!!). There are multiple methods by which broadband connections are provided ADSL (Asymmetric Digital Subscriber Line) - Most popularly called broadband.Cable Modem - Usually provided by cable TV operatorsPower Line Broadband - Yet to come in India3G4Getc etc…each works with different technologies.
